ca.mcgill.ecse211.threads

Class RingSearcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.threads.RingSearcher

  • public class RingSearcher
extends java.lang.Object
    This class helps our robot to search for rings on a grid itself as a thread will search and retrieve the rings
    Author:
    Caspar Cedro, Percy Chen, Patrick Erath, Anssam Ghezala, Susan Matuszewski, Kamy Moussavi Kafi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RingSearcher(EV3LargeRegulatedMotor sensorMotor, EV3LargeRegulatedMotor rodMotor)
      This class provides method to check if there is a ring and if the ring is the color we want

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void prepareRetrieve()
      This method rotate the rod to a suitable position for retrieve the ring
      void protectRing()
      Protect the ring from dropping
      void resetRodMotor()
      Rotate the rod back to the original position
      void retrieveRing()
      this method retrieve the searched ring
      void search()
      This method searches for the ring and identify its color based using the rod, It will beep based on the color of the ring
      void unloadRing()
      unload all rings

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • RingSearcher

        public RingSearcher(EV3LargeRegulatedMotor sensorMotor,
                    EV3LargeRegulatedMotor rodMotor)
             throws OdometerExceptions
        This class provides method to check if there is a ring and if the ring is the color we want
        Parameters:
        storagenMotor: - the motor to move the storage of the robot
        rodMotor: - the motor for the rod to collect the ring
        Throws:
        OdometerExceptions
